share.copy.title: Copy link
share.to.web.before.tip: Publish and share link to everyone
share.to.web.after.tip: Anyone with the link can view
change.ip.title: Change IP
main.opt.warning.tip: This operation cannot be undone, continue?
share.static.tip: Gentle reminder: Should access prove elusive, consider IP switching. In environments beyond 127.0.0.1, kindly navigate to Settings->About->Network Servers to initiate server activation.
share.link.expires.time.placeholder: Units/sec, up to 7 days. 0 means permanent
main.label.siteUrl.placeholder: Please enter the full URL (including port if applicable). Ensure the domain is properly resolved, e.g., http://siyuan.terwergreen.com:6808
main.label.homePageId.placeholder: ID of the home page document. Note: It must be a shared document
